label: 山の手
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: The uptown" or "high city" area of Edo/Tokyo as opposed to the "downtown" (shitamachi) area. This hilly area described a semicircle around the shitamachi and was the site of many warrior residences.［江戸、東京、下町］"
